dct_title_s: World oil & gas map / Petroleum Economist Cartographic ; produced by the Petroleum Economist, a division of Euromoney Global Limited in partnership with ABN-AMRO ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush. (Title Card)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and shading. Depths shown by bathymetric tints and shading. Shows gas fields, oil fields, gas pipelines, oil pipelines, liquefied natural gas import terminals, liquefied natural gas export plants, refineries, and tanker terminals. "Published December 2014." Includes 6 ancillary maps, statistical tables, graphs, and legend. Title panel and color advertisements on verso. Charts: World oil statistics 2013. Charts: World gas statistics 2013.
